message: This is my first offer. I propose we divide the money in a way that allows us to both benefit. I'll take 769230.77 and you'll receive 230769.23.
I'll start with a strong offer. I'll give you 40% and take 60%
Considering the inflation, I've adjusted my offer. I propose we divide the money in a way that reflects the decreasing value of each dollar. I'll take 689655.17 and you'll receive 310344.83.
I'll try to find a sweet spot. I'll give you 45% and take 55%

I've adjusted my offer again, taking into account the inflation. I propose dividing the money such that I receive 654098.36 and you receive 345901.64. This aims to balance our shares while considering the diminishing value of money over time.
Let's meet in the middle. I'll give you 50% and take 50%
